properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Planting of Epala trees with community participatory programs

Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop

Miscellane

properties.Observatio: Sewage from homes has been diverted in to the canal.Sewage accumulates in to waterways,The environment is polluted due to excessive stench.Dengue and various disease is spread occures.
properties.Descript_1:
Removal of illicit diversions to the canal

Supplying of garbage bins

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%

properties.Descriptio: Oya reservation (from the starting of Komarikagoda Aramaya to Pahala Kahattewela bridge)
properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Planting of Epala trees with community participatory programs

Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly m
